summary:
Replaces intro video with a video called Thrones by Brady Wold
(https://vimeo.com/90589442)
descriptionHtml:
Description:

This is a replacer for the standard bethesda intro video.
The video is by Brady Wold it can be found here https://vimeo.com/90589442, all credits go to him.
Install with NMM.


Warning:

The video is a slightly lower quality than the original, and since it's a bik format it cannot be skipped.
So if you don't want to wait a minute and forty seconds to get to start menu every time you start skyrim this is not for you.
author: Brady Wold
